inclusion.criterion: IPAH and SPAH not responding to current medical therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mean PAP >25 mm Hg at rest
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: structural heart diseases with left-to right shunting and/or Eisenmenger syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with hypertension, hyperlipidemia, hypothyroidism, smoking history, and recent stroke.
